attributes.action: The UK should follow Poland's policy on immigration and refugees
attributes.additional_details: The Polish minister says that they can be accused of being racist, nationalist and populist. However he says that they don't care he cares about his family and his country.I am the son of two legal immigrants from India and I agree with him wholeheartedly.
attributes.background: If you see https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DQKpRhVPeHA then the Polish Minister has said this is why Poland is so safe- they have not had one terror attack- we should do the same.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what policies you would like the UK Government or Parliament to follow.

You could start a new petition setting out clearly which specific Polish policies you would like the UK to adopt.
